Description: Leg and lower body fragment of blue/green glazed composition (faience) figurine or pendant depicting a naked woman; mould-made; the figurine is standing and shown frontally, with her right arm by the side; the anatomical detail is very schematic; black painted detail.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.123, Tomb 201)
